sources.name: Brian Mitchell – International Historical Statistics (Deaths per 1,000)
sources.description:
Data published by Brian Mitchell – International Historical Statistics (Births per 1,000)
Data publisher's source -
Linkhttp://www.palgraveconnect.com/pc/doifinder/10.1057/9781137305688.0001
Retrieved–

Additional information

Edited by Palgrave Macmillan Ltd . (April 2013). International Historical Statistics . [Online] Available at: http://www.palgraveconnect.com/pc/doifinder/10.1057/9781137305688.0001
These statistics – orignally published under the editorial leadership of Brian Mitchell (since 1983) – are a collection of data sets taken from many primary sources, including both official national and international abstracts dating back to 1750. The books are published in three volumes covering more than 5000 pages.

variables.name: Brian Mitchell – International Historical Statistics (Deaths per 1,000)
variables.coverage: Global by country (and in few countries disaggregated by race)
